alert.note: Alert for Douglas; Elbert (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 02 at 8:34PM MDT until August 02 at 9:15PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: The National Weather Service in Denver Colorado has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Douglas County in northeastern Colorado... West central Elbert County in east central Colorado... * Until 915 PM MDT. * At 834 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 6 miles east of Greenland, or 20 miles north of Colorado Springs, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Hail damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Elbert and Kiowa. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
